Key Match Events: The game featured a contentious play at second base where Jazz Chisholm Jr.'s stolen base was upheld after a lengthy replay review
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro expressed frustration over the replay decision but acknowledged the difficulty in overturning the call
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first ALDS opener for both teams in recent history with five lead changes and a final score of 6-5 in favor of the Yankees
Others: The replay process highlighted the challenges of determining clear evidence in outdoor sports
